title: Fort Foote Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets         Chloe is on her leash and is ready to have fun in the snow! Neil LaBrecque/ NPS Photo   Domestic pets are allowed in Fort Foote Park. All pets must leashed and under control at all times in the park. Please be courteous to our other visitors by picking up after your pet and properly disposing of waste.
